verbs.description: [V: racing] [ARG0: industry] harnesses data to reduce horse injuries fatal injury rates fell 14 percent in north america last year but climbed slightly at kentucky racetracks according to the jockey club equine injury database wdrb media woodford stakes dr mary scollay asher kentucky downs churchill downs jesus castanon jockey clubs equine injury database kentucky derby
